mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_target ( id, businessCode, createTime, updateTime, targetName, targetMonth, ifTarget ) VALUES (#{id},#{businessCode},NOW(),NOW(),#{targetName},#{targetMonth},'0')

INSERT INTO t_indicator_configuration (id, indicatorUserId, indicatorCode, indicatorName, indicatorValue, targetId) VALUES
(REPLACE(UUID(), _utf8'-', _utf8''),#{item.accountId},#{item.indicatorCode},#{item.indicatorName},#{item.indicatorValue},#{id})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.indicatorCode, c.indicatorName, c.indicatorValue, a.accountId FROM t_target t LEFT JOIN t_indicator_configuration c ON c.targetId = t.id LEFT JOIN hrm_db.t_hrm_accountinfo a ON a.AccountID = c.indicatorUserId WHERE t.id = #{id} GROUP BY c.indicatorCode

SELECT c.id,c.indicatorCode,c.indicatorName,c.indicatorValue,c.indicatorUserId AS accountId,a.RealName as name FROM t_target t LEFT JOIN t_indicator_configuration c ON c.targetId = t.id LEFT JOIN hrm_db.t_hrm_accountinfo a ON a.AccountID = c.indicatorUserId WHERE t.businessCode = #{businessCode} AND t.targetMonth = #{month} AND ifTarget = '0'

SELECT c.indicatorUserId AS accountId, a.Account AS account, a.RealName AS realName FROM t_target t LEFT JOIN t_indicator_configuration c ON c.targetId = t.id LEFT JOIN hrm_db.t_hrm_accountinfo a ON a.AccountID = c.indicatorUserId WHERE t.ifTarget = '0' AND t.businessCode = #{businessCode} GROUP BY c.indicatorUserId
